statements: SELECT * FROM trade_orders
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_amount FROM trade_orders WHERE order_status='pending'
SELECT order_id, order_amount, order_status FROM trade_orders WHERE order_type='BUY' ORDER BY order_amount DESC
SELECT order_id, order_type, trade_date FROM trade_orders WHERE trade_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY trade_date ASC
SELECT * FROM trade_orders WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM trade_orders WHERE order_status = 'OPEN' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_type FROM trade_orders WHERE order_amount > 1000 ORDER BY trade_date ASC, order_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(order_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(order_amount) AS min_amount FROM trade_orders WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, AVG(order_amount) AS avg_amount FROM trade_orders GROUP BY order_id HAVING avg_amount > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT order_type FROM trade_orders WHERE order_status = 'COMPLETED' ORDER BY order_type;
SELECT * FROM trade_orders;
SELECT order_id, order_type FROM trade_orders WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT market_name FROM market_information WHERE market_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM trade_orders WHERE order_timestamp >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT order_type, order_amount FROM trade_orders ORDER BY order_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM trade_orders ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_amount FROM trade_orders WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT market_name, market_type FROM market_information WHERE market_status = 'active';
SELECT order_timestamp, order_amount FROM trade_orders WHERE order_type = 'buy' ORDER BY order_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_information ORDER BY market_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_orders;
SELECT order_id, symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_orders WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT order_id, trader_id, symbol FROM trade_orders ORDER BY trader_id ASC, symbol DESC;
SELECT * FROM execution_data WHERE execution_quantity < 50 AND execution_price > 100.00;
SELECT symbol, last_trade_price, daily_high, daily_low FROM market_information WHERE last_trade_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM trade_orders ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM trade_orders WHERE trader_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT execution_id, execution_quantity, execution_price FROM execution_data WHERE execution_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY execution_timestamp ASC;
SELECT symbol, last_trade_price, market_cap FROM market_information WHERE volume > 1000000 AND daily_high > 100 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT trader_id, symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_orders JOIN execution_data ON trade_orders.order_id = execution_data.order_id WHERE execution_price > price;
SELECT * FROM trade_orders WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT symbol, price FROM trade_orders ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT account_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 5000
SELECT symbol, market_cap FROM market_information WHERE volume_traded > 1000000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC
SELECT order_id, order_type, symbol, quantity, price FROM trade_orders
SELECT * FROM trade_orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM trade_orders WHERE price > 100;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM execution_data WHERE execution_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT symbol, market_cap FROM market_information WHERE volume_traded > 1000000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades ORDER BY execution_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, trade_price, trade_quantity FROM trades WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_price ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, order_type FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'OPEN';
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT market_price, market_volume, market_time FROM market_data WHERE market_price < 50 AND market_volume > 1000 ORDER BY market_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades ORDER BY trade_id DESC;
SELECT trade_id, order_id, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_quantity > 100 ORDER BY execution_time ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'admin' AND registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT instrument_name, market_price FROM market_data WHERE market_time >= TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND market_volume < 1000 ORDER BY market_price DESC;

SELECT executions.execution_id, executions.executed_quantity, trades.trade_price FROM executions INNER JOIN trades ON executions.trade_id = trades.trade_id WHERE executions.execution_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
